settings.title: Shipping & Return
settings.content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the "Complete Orders" link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

settings.text: Fast & Free Shipping. Typically Delivers Within 1-5 Working Days
3-year Warranty. With Blacklyte's Warranty Coverage, You Can Shop With Peace of Mind.
Easy & Safe Installation. We Prioritize Simplicity, Ensuring a Hassle-free Experience.

settings.video_block_title: Atlas Desk - Redefining Work And Entertainment Experience
settings.video_block_des: The Atlas Desk Is A Cutting-Edge Adjustable Standing Desk That Offers An Unbeatable Immersive Work And Enterainment Experience.

settings.title: Design
settings.des: Users Can Store And Recall Commonly Used Heights With A Single Button.

settings.title: IDA Design
settings.des: The Desk Combines Interactive Visualization, Cable Management, And Motion Control.

settings.title: K Design
settings.des: The Desk Visualizes In-Game Interactions. It Provides E-Sports Enthusiasts With An Immersive Gaming Experience.

settings.title: Lifting Speed Of Up To 1.5in/S
settings.des: High Torque Allows For Quick Starts And Responses Within Milliseconds Of The Command

settings.title: Presets: 2 Custom Heights
settings.des: Instantly Shift Between Two Custom Presets To Lock In Your Perfect Setup With The Press Of A Button.

settings.title: Height Adjustment 28'' - 54''
settings.des: Height Range From 28'' To 54'' Gives Your The Flexibility To Transition Effortlessly From Sitting To Standing For The Ultimote Comfort.

settings.title: Max Weight: 275lb
settings.des: Designed To Withstand Up To 275lbs, This Heavy-Duty Desk Is Built To Support Even The Most Intense Caming Setups.

settings.title: Low Noise (<48db)
settings.des: The High-Precision Transmission Reduces Friction, Providing A Quieter Experience During Adjustment.

settings.title: Patented Lighting Hand Control System
settings.des: Effortlessly Switch Between Vibrant Lighting Effects.

settings.title: Blacklyte's First AI Algorithm Interactive Lighting System
settings.des: Connect To The Game System Through PC Program, Intelligently Capture Character Movements, And Trigger Responsive Lighting Feedback. Provide Over 1000 Interactive Effects As Players Dynamically Change.

settings.title: Immersive Emotional Light Therapy
settings.des: Blacklyte Has Customized Eight Unique Scene Lighting Effects Based Onresearch Into 'emotional Lighting'theory. These Effects Stimulate The Light-Sensitive Areas Of the Brain, Helping Regulate Neurotransmitter Secretion And Trigger The 'emotional Explosion Point.

settings.title: Intelligent Light Control Rendering System
settings.des: Easily Select Colors And Dynamic Effects To Match Your Preferences. The System Also Allows For Independent Control Of Duration, Ensuring Smooth , Seamless Transitions To Meet Your Unique Lighting Needs.

settings.spotlight_block_title: BLACKLYTE Pioneers AI Algorithm Integration For Immersive Gaming Experience

settings.heading: Patented Internal Alignment Technology For Table Legs
settings.text: Integrated Cable Management Power Cords Are Discreetly Hidden Within The Tablelegs Topreventdangling, Reducing The Risk Oftripping And Accidentaldisconnection.

settings.heading: Side-Mounted Sliding Rail For Expanded Desktop Space
settings.text: The Side-Mounted Sliding Rails Allow For The Installation Of Headphone. Hooks And Other Personalized Accessories, Maximizing Desktop Space.

settings.heading: High-Strength Cold-Rolled Steel Legs
settings.text: Constructed With Automotive-Grade Cold-Rolled Steel, The Table Legs Support Up To 125kg. Ensuring Stability And Safety For All Types Of Gaming Equipment And Accessories.

settings.heading: Openable Rear Suspension Pod
settings.text: Rear Desktop Storage Compartment Designed For Organizing Excess Cables And Bulkyequipment, The Compartment Features An Invisibleflip-Cover Design. Close The Lid For A Streamlinedclutter-Free' Zero-Cable'desktop Aesthetic.

settings.heading: How do IÂ track my order?
settings.content: Once your order ships, you'll receive a shipping confirmation email and tracking number, so you can follow your package as it makes its way to you. However, tracking information can take up to 24 hours to update, so donâ€™t worry if it doesn't show up immediately. We recommend tracking your order and ensuring that youâ€™re home on the day of delivery to receive your order.

settings.heading: When will my order be shipped?
settings.content: Â Inventory orders are typically shipped the next business day and will be delivered within 1-5 business days. Â For more information, please check ourÂ Shipping and Return Policy.

settings.heading: My order has been shipped. Can I change or cancel my order?
settings.content: Unfortunately, we are unable to cancel your order once it ships.

settings.heading: Can I exchange my orderï¼Ÿ
settings.content: For the most efficient resolution to obtain the item you desire, we recommend returning the original item. Once your return is approved, we encourage you to proceed with a separate purchase for the new item. Â For more information, please check ourÂ Return & Refund Policy.

settings.heading: How will my order be delivered?
settings.content: We deliver your order straight to your address via FedEx & Canada Post. Youâ€™ll receive an email with a tracking number when your order ships, so you can easily track your order. Please ensure that youâ€™re home on the day of delivery to receive your order.

settings.heading: What do I do if I face an issue with my purchase?
settings.content: In the unlikely event that you come across any damaged, defective or missing parts, please contact us at support@blacklyte.com with a photo of the affected area and your order number. Our support specialists will do their best to assist you.
